tuv.seg: Overview Document Education and training supports Find out about the various ways of continuing your education, furthering your training and acquiring new skills

Overview Document Traenáil agus oideachas leanúnach Cur síos ar na bealaigh chun leanacht ar aghaidh le do chuid oideachais agus do chuid traenála praiticiúil a fheabhsú, seachas dul trí chóras na scoile agus córas na gcoláistí
Post Leaving Certificate (PLC) courses offer a mixture of practical work, academic work and work experience to school leavers and adult participants
Tá eolas anseo ar chúrsaí IAT, céard atá iontu, iaratais, liúntaisí agus cé atá i dteideal an cúrsa a dhéanamh
Youthreach provides opportunities for people who left school without formal qualifications to build on their basic education and improve work skills
Cur síos ar an gclár Youthreach - eolas ar na hábhair, ar fhad an chúrsa agus ar na hionaid
Further Education and Training (FET) courses
Cúrsaí oiliúna Breisoideachais agus Oiliúna (BOO)
Information about Further Education and Training (FET) training courses provided in Education and Training Board Training Centres, including eligibility conditions and allowances
Cur síos ar an Cúrsaí Breisoideachais agus Oiliúna (FET), suíomhanna na gcúrsaí, intofacht, agus na liúntais atá ar fáil
Further Education and Training (FET) allowances
Liúntais Bhreisoideachais agus Oiliúna (BOO)
If you get a place on a Further Education and Training (FET) training course you may be paid an allowance for the duration of your course
Má fhaigheann tú áit ar Cúrsaí Breisoideachais agus Oiliúna (FET) d'fhéadfá liúntas ar feadh an chúrsa a bheith íoctha leat
Childcare during vocational training
Cúram Leanaí le linn cúrsaí gairmoiliúna
You may qualify for a subsidised childcare place, if you are attending certain types of vocational training provided by an Education and Training Board (ETB), Momentum or Community Employment
Tá scéim chúraim leanaí ann do dhaoine atá ag freastal ar chlár oiliúna gairme de chuid FÁS
Skills training linked to national development
Scileanna traenála náscaithe le comhlucht náisiúnta
This document describes the training available through Government funded agencies linked to the commercial or the industrial sector
Deánann an doiciméad seo cur síos ar an traenáil atá ar fáil trí eagraíochtaí maoinithe Rialtais náscaithe le rannóg tionsclaíochta agus trádála
Life skills training for people with vision impairments
Bunchúrsa do dhaoine le lagú amhairc

This course for people with vision impairments is run by the National Council for the Blind of Ireland. It offers an individual rehabilitation programme to people with a significant degree of sight loss

Tairgaíonn an cúrsa seo do dhaoine le lagú amhairc, atá dhá riaradh ag Comhairle Náisiúnta na hÉireann do na Daill, réimse oiliúna i scileanna saoil do dhaoine atá bhfuil cailliúint shuntasach de radharc na súl orthu
An overview of some options for school-leavers
Léargas ar roinnt roghanna d'fhágóirí scoile
Information about apprenticeships, who is eligible for them and the allowances for participants
Cuireann Momentum rochtain ar fáil ar thionscadail oideachais agus oiliúna agus ar thacaíocht saor in aisce chun lámh chúnta a thabhairt do dhaoine atá dífhostaithe le tréimhse fhada obair a fháil
Momentum provides access to free education and training projects to help long-term unemployed people access work
Faisnéis faoi phrintíseachtaí, faoi cé atá incháilithe ina leith agus faoi liúntais do rannpháirtithe
Most Read in "Education and Training"
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Oideachas agus Oiliúint"
School terms in primary and post-primary schools
Téarmaí scoile i mbunscoileanna agus iarbhunscoileanna
Further Education and Training (FET) allowances
Liúntais Bhreisoideachais agus Oiliúna (BOO)
